duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with the monthly consolidation of the partners and ensure all transactions are properly recorded.
Assist in preparation of monthly financials and reporting decks.
Key resource for understanding the closing process for each of the partners, such as billing, accounts payable, and tracking revenue streams.
Responsible for process documentation of certain key close areas.
Provide direct support to Controller and Finance team in implementing the integration playbook.
Assist with opening balance sheet accounting for each acquisition, data requests, reviewing and mapping chart of accounts.
Key resource in tracking and implementing the Company’s lease accounting playbook.
Will be a main user and key contact for the entity’s core ERP system.
Prepare certain recurring and non-recurring monthly journal entries.
Assist with miscellaneous projects as requested by the accounting team and Controller.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.A.) in accounting from a four-year college or university and a minimum of two or three years of related work experience.
